title: Bella Vol. 4
description: A Mafia Romance  Bella is a serial series. 1 new book in this serial will release every month through 2016.  I hated him for the things he took from me. I hated him for the love he refused me. But after all of the hate and anger, I knew without a doubt that I was irrevocably in love with Jax Moretti. I'm a woman born into a man's world. I've stood tall and held my own knowing the people that wanted my family in the ground, weren't far behind and soon they'd be exactly where I want them to be.  My name is Isabella Sagatori-Moretti. I will protect my family.
author: Kimberly Soto
